name: Space Collider
description:
Experience a new twist on the gameplay of original Space Invaders! Destroy asteroids and defend Earth from waves of alien invaders!

Features:

  • New alien groups for the player to clear out
  • Asteroids that break up into smaller asteroids upon destruction
  • Powerups that give temporary player effects and extra score
  • Two new gamemodes (Standard Mode and Endless Mode)
  • Randomized alien groups in Endless Mode
